casebody.data:
FELTON
v.
BUTLER, et al. 161P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. David Felton, for Felton, David.

*695The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of September 2017 by Plaintiff for Reconsideration:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
